info.description: Retrieves Nostro position information for the legal entity
info.title: Holdings Nostros APIs

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: currencyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the curreny. The is the 3 letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

displayName.description: The name used for display purposes

bookingDate.description: The date on which the entry was generated. Normally, but not necessarily, the actual date at the time the entry is generated, e.g. if the previous day's business is still being processed after midnight, the actual date changes, but the run date is still the previous day.
